BBEX3.A.BWP.EUR.CM.AB.A04: Exchange rates for the euro in Botswana / BWP 1 = EUR ... (selling)
Methodology: Calculated on the basis of month-end rates.

Comment on 2005: On 30 May 2005, Botswana's currency was devalued by 12% against the reference basket of currencies. We recorded the following exchange rates (buying/selling rate).  27 May 2005: BWP 1 = EUR 0,1664 / 0,1659  30 May 2005: BWP 1 = EUR 0,1478 / 0,1463.  Calculated devaluation: 11.5% (middle rate).
